DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety atorvastatin treatment Taiwanese patient diabetes high cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety And Efficacy Of Atorvastatin In Patients With Diabetes And High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Adult Taiwanese outpatient type 2 diabetes mellitus high cholesterol Hemoglobin A1c level ≤10 % , LDLC level ≥130 mg/dL , serum triglyceride level < 400 mg/dL Type I diabetes mellitus Secondary cause high cholesterol Elevated liver enzyme
